short_summary: Request for Proposal for Trailer, Low Bed.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice #### Status: Cancelled * **Reference Number**: PW-22-01015005 * **Solicitation Number**: W1568SU-23-0022 * **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal * **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding * **Category**: Goods and Services (GD) * **Location of Delivery**: Northwest Territories * **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada #### Overview This tender notice has been cancelled. The Contracting Entity is the Department of National Defence, located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2 Canada. #### Points of Contact * Contact Name: Eric Duhamel * Contact E-mail: [erics.duhamel@forces.gc](mailto:eric.duhamel@forces.gc) * Phone Number: 867-446-0489 * Address: Eric Duhamel,
Corresponding email address & mailbox
PO BOX 6666
Yellowknife, NT
X1A 2R3. Note: No additional information is provided about Eric Duhamel's job title or department. #### Additional Details * **GSMN Category**: Trailer, Low Bed (*N2330F) and Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA) ### Requirement Details There are no further details about the goods or services to be delivered, the project scope, or the evaluation criteria. **Contractor Contracting Parties** Contracting Parties and potential bidders are advised of this notice of cancellation. Any bids submitted prior to this cancellation will not be accepted. All inquiries related to this project are to be directed to Eric Duhamel. ### Source of Information Contractors are notified to operate under Trade Agreements. However, no additional rules, regulations and policies of the contracting entity have been made available. **NDGR** Contract dates have likely been closed. Both parties may contact, discuss, and give feedback about outstanding bills prior to the tender being annulled. Consent may be required to call to mind affidavits pertaining to past obligations, unresolved issues, and CTAs. Not verified.
